trans-unit.source: Gets role information for Windows-based applications from an [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] roles service.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon om for Windows-baserte programmer fra en [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] roller tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: You can use client application services to retrieve role information from an existing roles service by configuring your application to use the ClientRoleProvider class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke programtjenester klienten til å hente informasjon om en eksisterende roller tjeneste ved å konfigurere programmet for å bruke ClientRoleProvider-klassen.

trans-unit.source: After configuration, you can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Etter konfigurasjonen, kan du finne ut om en godkjent bruker er i en bestemt rolle ved å kalle den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>returnert av den `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> for programmer som er konfigurert til å bruke klienten programtjenester

trans-unit.source: Because this class implements the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne klassen implementerer den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>grensesnittet du trenger ikke å referere til den eksplisitt.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method internally calls the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName>internt metodekall den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ClientRoleProvider class is a read-only role membership provider that retrieves role information for authenticated users from the roles service indicated by the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ClientRoleProvider er en skrivebeskyttet medlemskap rolleleverandør som henter informasjon om for godkjente brukere fra tjenesten roller som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A> property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>egenskapen vanligvis hentes fra programmets konfigurasjonsfil sammen med andre verdier.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ServiceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: Konfigurer klienten programtjenester](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the current ClientRoleProvider instance through the `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente den gjeldende ClientRoleProvider forekomsten via den `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ClientRoleProvider class supports only the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ClientRoleProvider støtter bare <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>og <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>metoder for <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>abstrakt klasse.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call one of these methods for a particular user, the service provider first checks the local data cache for role information.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller en av disse metodene for en bestemt bruker, kontrollerer tjenesteleverandøren først lokale datahurtigbufferen for informasjon om.

trans-unit.source: If the cache does not contain any role information or the cache has expired, the service provider retrieves the role information from the roles service and adds it to the cache.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hurtigbufferen inneholder ikke rolleinformasjon eller hurtigbufferen er utløpt, tjenesteleverandøren henter role-informasjon fra tjenesten roller, og legges til i hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the time-out period for the roles cache when you configure client application services.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi tidsavbruddperioden for hurtigbufferen roller når du konfigurerer programmet klienttjenesten.

trans-unit.source: To force the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method to retrieve role data from the service instead of the local cache, call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ResetCache%2A> method first.
trans-unit.target: Tvinge den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>metode for å hente rollen data fra tjenesten i stedet for den lokale hurtigbufferen, kall den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ResetCache%2A>metoden første.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.ResetCache%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the ClientRoleProvider class to create or delete roles, or to modify the role membership of users.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke bruke klassen ClientRoleProvider til å opprette eller slette roller, eller endre Rollemedlemskap for brukere.

trans-unit.source: To create or modify role information, you must change the configuration of the role service on the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette eller endre informasjon om, må du endre konfigurasjonen av role-tjenesten på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of the roles that the specified user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Henter navn på roller som den angitte brukeren tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The GetRolesForUser method retrieves role information for the current, authenticated user, which you must specify in the `username` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetRolesForUser henter rolleinformasjon for den aktuelle godkjente brukeren, som du må angi i den `username` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: You can get the user name through the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as follows: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få brukernavnet via den `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen som følger: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.Name`.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren av bufrer rolleinformasjon om det lokale filsystemet å unngå unødvendige service-kall.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the user to retrieve roles for.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på brukeren til å hente roller for.

trans-unit.source: The role names that username belongs to or an empty array if the user is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Rollen navngir som username tilhører eller en tom matrise Hvis brukeren ikke er godkjent.

trans-unit.source: username is or .
trans-unit.target: usernameis or .

trans-unit.source: -or- username is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: - eller - username er ikke brukernavnet for den aktuelle brukeren som er godkjent.

trans-unit.target: Alltid et.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the provider.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the Initialize method to initialize the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> using information in your application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] utvidelsesmodellen kaller initialiseringsmetoden initialisere den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>ved hjelp av informasjonen i programmets konfigurasjonsfil.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: This method recognizes the following role service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `cacheTimeout` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` - `honorCookieExpiry` For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjenkjenner følgende rollen service configuration attributter:- `name` - `description` - `cacheTimeout` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` - `honorCookieExpiry` For mer informasjon om disse attributtene, kan du se [slik: Konfigurer klienten programtjenester](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the provider.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert navn for leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: A collection of name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.
trans-unit.target: En samling av navn/verdi-par som representerer leverandørspesifikk attributtene som er angitt i konfigurasjonen for denne leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: -or- config is .
trans-unit.target: -or- config is .

trans-unit.source: name is empty.
trans-unit.target: nameer tom.

trans-unit.source: -or- config contains an unrecognized value.
trans-unit.target: - eller - config inneholder en ukjent verdi.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider"></xref> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider"> </xref> er allerede initialisert.

trans-unit.source: config contains a `cacheTimeout` value that is not in the correct format for conversion to an value.
trans-unit.target: configinneholder en `cacheTimeout` verdi som ikke er i riktig format for konvertering til en verdi.

trans-unit.source: config contains a `cacheTimeout` value that represents a number less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: configinneholder en `cacheTimeout` verdien som representerer et tall under eller større enn .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den angitte brukeren er i den angitte rollen.

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether an authenticated user is in a particular role by calling the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan fastslå om en godkjent bruker er i en bestemt rolle ved å kalle den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>returnert av den `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: For applications configured to use client application services, this property returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> for programmer som er konfigurert til å bruke klienten programtjenester

trans-unit.source: Because this class implements the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface, you do not need to reference it explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne klassen implementerer den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>grensesnittet du trenger ikke å referere til den eksplisitt.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method internally calls the IsUserInRole method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodekall internt metoden IsUserInRole.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IsUserInRole method uses the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method to determine whether the user indicated by `username` is in the role indicated by `roleName`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsUserInRole bruker den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>metoden for å bestemme om brukeren som er angitt av `username` er angitt av rollen `roleName`.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The service provider caches role information about the local file system to avoid unnecessary service calls.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren av bufrer rolleinformasjon om det lokale filsystemet å unngå unødvendige service-kall.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the user.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på rollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified user is in the specified role; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the specified user is not authenticated or is not in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren som er angitt i den angitte rollen; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den angitte brukeren ikke er godkjent eller er ikke i den angitte rollen.

trans-unit.source: username is or .
trans-unit.target: usernameis or .

trans-unit.source: -or- username is not the user name of the current, authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: - eller - username er ikke brukernavnet for den aktuelle brukeren som er godkjent.

trans-unit.source: The user is no longer authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren er ikke godkjent.

trans-unit.source: -or- The roles service is not available.
trans-unit.target: - eller - roller-tjenesten er ikke tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: This method is not used by this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes ikke av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Ikke brukt.

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Ikke brukt.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: Alltid et.

trans-unit.source: Clears the cached role information and resets the cache time-out period.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner bufrede role-informasjon og tilbakestiller tidsavbruddsperioden for hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: The ResetCache method removes all role information from the local cache and causes the cache to expire.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ResetCache fjerner alle rolleinformasjon fra den lokale hurtigbufferen og fører til hurtigbufferen utløper.

trans-unit.source: After you call this method, your next call to the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> or <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> method will retrieve role information from the configured role service instead of the local cache.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller denne metoden, neste kall til den <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>metoden henter rolleinformasjon fra rolletjenesten konfigurerte i stedet for den lokale hurtigbufferen.</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to enable users to refresh the roles cache when their role has changed but the cache has not yet expired.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden for at brukere skal kunne oppdatere hurtigbufferen roller når deres rolle er endret, men hurtigbufferen ennå ikke er utløpt.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to set the roles cache time-out interval, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du angir tidsavbruddet roller hurtigbufferen, kan du se [slik: Konfigurer klienten programtjenester](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This method is not used by this class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes ikke av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Ikke brukt.

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder ikke.

trans-unit.source: This method always throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppstår alltid det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: Alltid et.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI of the role service.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URIEN for rolletjenesten.

trans-unit.source: You can set the ServiceUri property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen ServiceUri i programkoden, men du vanligvis setter verdien i programmets konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan endre plassering for tjenesten uten å kompilere koden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: Konfigurer klienten programtjenester](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Role_JSON_AppService.axd".
trans-unit.target: Når du angir plassering for tjenesten programmatisk, må du angi komplett tjeneste URI, som alltid slutter med "Role_JSON_AppService.axd".

trans-unit.source: The role service URI.
trans-unit.target: URIEN til rolletjenesten.

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.
trans-unit.target: Under henting av denne egenskapen, ingen URI ble funnet i programmets konfigurasjonsfil, og denne egenskapen har ikke allerede er angitt.
